hero.description: I'm a Front-End developer specialized in building modern and intuitive solutions with React and Vue

aboutMe.title: About Me
aboutMe.text: My journey as a programmer began in 2020 when I created my first personal website. I was captivated by the power of technology to solve problems of varying complexity. Since then, I've been refining my web development skills. In 2021, I completed the Trybe program, and since then, I have worked as a Front-End Developer, building scalable and efficient solutions with React and Vue.

form.name: Name
form.invalidName: Name must have at least 3 characters
